Posts.Content: Prostate cancer is the solid mass inside large solid prostate mass. Can current imaging technology get clear image of prostate cancer and prostate with their clear boundary? I have the question because I never get exact size of my prostate cancer. What technology can measure exact size of the prostate cancer?
Posts.Title: Prostate cancer size

Posts.Content: The size is a “macroscopic” concept and pathology is a “microscopic” concept. Am I right?
Posts.Title: Prostate cancer size

Posts.Content: Steve, Thank you for the information.
Posts.Title: Low PSA causes big trouble for me

Posts.Content: One month ago I was told that I got prostate cancer with Gleason 4 + 5 = 9. Also the cancer may already spread to lymph nodes and may also to bone. Of course, this is very bad news for me. But in last years (2016) I did three times of PSA test. The results are 3.085, 3.567, 2.889 that misled me and my urology doctor that delayed the finding prostate cancer in early stage. Is very special the prostate cancer with low PSA? Four and half years ago (September 2012) I was taken TURP prostate surgery that the result showed I had 2 ships cancer in total 156 chips (1.28%, of course this percentage is very low). My doctor told me that we wait and watch and my understanding is we watch PSA. In the four and half years I took total 11 times of PSA test. The results are: 3.07, 2.831, 4.319, 3.287, 3.064, 3.257, 4.033, 4.466, 3.085, 3.567, 2.889 (3 times PSA was higher than 4 in the four and half years). The doctor told me I do not have risk for prostate cancer (now the doctor retired). But I got prostate cancer now that I should complain to my urology doctor (I know the complain is already no any use)?
Posts.Title: Low PSA causes big trouble for me

Posts.Content: HighlanderCFH, Thank you very much for your response. I am 74 years old. Let me repeat some information about my prostate cancer: One month ago I was performed TURP prostate surgery for urine retention that told I got prostate cancer with Gleason 4 + 5 = 9. After that I did NM Bone Scan that “Multifocal activity in patient with provided history of prostate cancer is concerning for metastatic disease. Lesions, however, do not correlate with pelvic bone CT finding”. Also I did CT Pelvis W Con “Pelvic lymphadenopathy demonstrated. 1.8, 1.9, 2.0 cm”. But in last years (2016) I did three times of PSA test. The results are 3.085, 3.567, 2.889 that misled me and my urology doctor that delayed the finding prostate cancer in early stage. Four and half years ago (September 2012) I was taken TURP prostate surgery that the result showed I had 2 ships cancer in total 156 chips (1.28%, of course this percentage is very low). That time (2012), Gleason was 4 + 3 = 7 (only 1.28% of total chips). My doctor told me that we “wait and watch” and my understanding is we “watch PSA”. In the four and half years I took total 11 times of PSA test. The results are: 3.07, 2.831, 4.319, 3.287, 3.064, 3.257, 4.033, 4.466, 3.085, 3.567, 2.889 (3 times PSA was higher than 4 in the four and half years). The doctor told me I do not have risk for prostate cancer (now the doctor retired). You gave suggestion that I should take second biopsy to confirm my Gleason? I do not know how can I ask second doctor to view my sample cut in one month ago. Even I do not know they keep the sample or not? Or can I ask second doctor to view and re-evaluate the images taken one month ago. Can I do that? Thank you again.
Posts.Title: Low PSA causes big trouble for me

Posts.Content: Steve, Thank you for response. Your PSA is also low. Why did you doubt you had the prostate cancer risk that time? Did you have any symptom? For me, I am planning to go Houston MD Anderson Cancer Center to seek the best treatment.
Posts.Title: Low PSA causes big trouble for me
